Articles.Content: Someone please point me to a mod to make crew rotation more automatic, nothing fancy just something to make the Jeb wait his turn to jump in the capsule is ok. Thanks in advance.
Thanks. Is a fine mod, however seems that it don’t have the exact functionality that I want. I will ask in the mod thread but looks like this is not the droid I’m looking for.
It may be possible, but I'm no modder.  I did notice though, that the in-flight portraits show a small log if you hover over the right place.  That log could probably be useful with the right skills.
